other_tests.findings: Narrowing of the distal third of the esophagus due to extrinsic compression.
Normal esophageal mucosa. Substantial luminal narrowing due to extrinsic compression.
Large, hypoechoic irregular mass adjacent to the esophagus and upper abdominal lymphadenopathy.
Malignant neoplasm with glandular differentiation and signet-ring cells.

other_tests.date: Before and after treatment with crizotinib
other_tests.findings: Increased radiotracer uptake in T1 and L4 vertebrae before treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvement seen in T1 and L4 metastases after treatment.
